definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: I put my toothbrush in the mug.
sentences.chinese: 我把我的牙刷放在马克杯里。

sentences.english: Then he’d filled the mug again and brought it back to the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 后来他再次将马克杯装满水端回到卧室。

sentences.english: The mug on my desk is is maybe five inches tall, weighs less than a pound, and is light purple.
sentences.chinese: 我桌上有个5英寸高，不到一磅的紫色马克杯。

sentences.english: Behind the counter,Gunther cleans the gaudy, oversize mugs and puts them away。
sentences.chinese: 吧台后面，冈瑟擦着华丽的大马克杯并把它们摆放好。

sentences.english: Also note that metal and silver mugs and cups will frost better than glasses.
sentences.chinese: 金属杯尤其是银质马克杯，挂霜较玻璃杯更佳。

sentences.english: There are a few mug is made from natural stone and it more expensive than others .
sentences.chinese: 也有少数马克杯由天然石制成，一般价格较高。

sentences.english: Coffee and tea can leave stubborn marks on cups and mugs.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡和茶会在茶杯和马克杯上留下顽渍。

sentences.english: Lizzy turned to the kettle and poured boiling water into the mug.
sentences.chinese: 里茨转向那个水壶，将沸腾的开水倒入马克杯。

sentences.english: Where De Zhou City place having the cup customizing mark?
sentences.chinese: 德州市哪里有定做马克杯的地方？

definition: bone china (fine white porcelain made from a mixture of clay and bone ash)
